Author:

Name: Roemer B. Lievaart
Location: NL

To build:

make all

Try:

./roemer

Judges’ remarks:

Do you know what this program does? If you do, look again, there is more here than meets the PI.

Author’s remarks:

Passes lint, but not with the strictest options, for it contains some “null-statements”, as well two identifiers which are, if compilers only take 6 characters, the same. It also uses write(2), so not totally system independent.

You are very much invited to pass this program through a C-beautifier (first strip newlines and tabs, if your cb can’t do that).
